Package com.mygdx.pirategame.screens

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.pirategame.screens.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class GameScreen extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Game Screen Class to generate the various screens used to play the game. Instantiates all screen types and displays current screen.

    • show

      public void show()
      Makes this the current screen for the game. Generates the buttons to be able to interact with what screen is being displayed. Creates the escape menu and pause button
